comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Bertha Hale White was a teacher, a journalist, and Assistant Executive Secretary of the Socialist Party of America, based in Chicago, from 1922-1925.  She married Judson King, a journalist and activist lecturer, in 1926; she was widowed in 1958.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for her in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bertha_Hale_White
